Text: E̩ gbo̩ adua-mi, O Jihofa;
E̩ ki dʼeju-we̩ maja bʼumi te̩
Todu ojolugbo-mi alenyo̩ rʼile̩ dab odudu una,
Ma fʼe̩do̩-mi gwo oñ i gbe̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼegbe;
Lugbo omu ifi kʼu nafi
Omi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩kpamadu ef aje̩tachi,
Nagwe̩ke̩ adide,
Ame̩nebi-mi nabʼumi ina gbogbo dʼo̩jo̩,
Todu omi fʼelulu je̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼuje̩wñ,
todu e̩do̩ e̩kpa-we̩ kpai uwe̩do̩-we̩;
Olugbo̩-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼojiji kʼi te̩ jiji;
O Jihofa, uwe̩ muda agugu ogbegbele̩;
Uwe̩ akwane̩kʼe̩ li Zayo̩n ejumomi;
Todu okuta okuta-wñ chenyo̩ amadu-we̩ eju,
Abe̩le̩ tak abo uche̩ichi arailo odu Jihofa,
Todu Jihofa ane̩ Zayo̩n,
adua abo ki tago ofo le̩ chewʼo̩ eju,
Ma akʼe-le̩ nyʼef o̩takada tod abo o̩gba ki awa ge̩,
Todu i dʼoji lo̩ ago kwʼatate̩ ugbo uña-wñ kiafo̩ le̩,
kʼi gbo̩ ifi e̩namu le̩,
ku ma dʼodu Jihofa kpogo efu Zayo̩n,
e̩gba ku ma kʼamone̩ jeju jo̩,
I fʼukpahiu-mi bulo̩ ej o̩na;
U kakini, O O̩jo̩-mi, e̩ ki dʼumi alo alumeji iko-mi n,
Igbelegbele uwe̩ dʼunyane̩ ane̩ ile̩ te̩,
Ama alenyo̩, uwe̩ muda ado̩mo̩ waa;
uwe̩ muda dʼalu kʼe̩ de̩,
Amo̩ma amadu-we̩ agugu waa;
